name: Quickshift Racing
description:
Low poly arcade racer, fun and addictive.

It's time to turn up the boost, put on those racing gloves and buckle up! Quickshift racing is here, hit the track instead of the street and race your customized Mitsibushi Lancer Evolution against others to see if you have what it takes to win a spot on that podium and secure the championship trophy. Ready? GO!

  • Single-player arcade racer like back in the days of Ridge Racer
  • Cars, cars, and more cars
  • Drift around those corners!
  • Hours of fun!
  • Challenging and fun for everyone.
